title: Adorable Baby: Stop There, Daddy - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Children   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage   Smart Couple
author: 清欢
description:
She, being set up by her husband, became a laughing stock in the city and was forced to leave. Four years later, she came back with a brand-new self. Revenge was a dish better served cold. She swore to take back everything that belonged to her.
He, by mistake, got himself involved in her life. He wanted to make up his mistake, and ended up falling in love…
“Wen Shuyue, one son is enough for us. If only we can have lovely daughters. The more, the better.”
>
